strings.clears-intro-get-started-prefix: To get started, add a Guild Wars 2 API key in the
strings.clears-all-accounts-hidden: All accounts are currently set as hidden in API key settings.
strings.setting-short-encounter-names-descriptio: Show shorter names in the table instead of the official ones from the API.
strings.setting-check-updates-description: Check for updates every time the game is launched, and show a window with details if one is available.
strings.setting-unfinished-clear-color-descripti: The background color for cells with unfinished encounters.
strings.setting-finished-clear-color-description: The background color for cells with finished encounters.
strings.setting-clears-style-description: The layout style of tables showing your clears.
strings.setting-clears-header-style-description: Show account names in My clears. Useful if showing clears for multiple accounts. Does not affect the single row layout.
strings.setting-keybind-window-clears-descriptio: The key for opening the clears window, used with the modifiers configured in arcdps. The numbers are virtual key codes, you can find tables on the internet. Leave empty to disable.
strings.setting-keybind-window-apikeys-descripti: The key for opening the API key management window, used with the modifiers configured in arcdps. The numbers are virtual key codes, you can find tables on the internet. Leave empty to disable.
strings.setting-close-window-with-escape-descrip: Close open windows by pressing Escape.
strings.clears-no-public-data-yet: Data from the GW2 API is not yet available.
strings.clears-no-clears-data-yet: Clear data is not yet available.
strings.api-key-window-intro-first-key: Click the button to add your first Guild Wars 2 API key.
strings.api-key-window-intro: Add another Guild Wars 2 API key or select an existing key on the left side.
strings.api-key-guide-step2: 2. Create a NEW key just for this plugin
strings.api-key-guide-step4: 4. Paste the new api key into the textbox above
strings.api-key-guide-step5: 5. Click the Check API key button
strings.api-key-warning-permission-account-missi: The API key is missing the account permission!
strings.api-key-warning-permission-progression-m: The API key is missing the progression permission!
strings.api-key-warning-subtoken-url-missing-acc: The subtoken does not have access to /v2/account!
The subtoken does not have access to /v2/account/raids!
